title: "Buying booze? Your face — or palm — could verify your age"
excerpt: "A system called MyCheckr \"takes an image of your face, analyzes that image, and returns whether or not you’re over the 'challenge age'\" to buy booze or smokes, explains Andrew O'Brien, product manager at Innovative Technology Ltd., the U.K. company behind it."
